title: enpAl nI uLLam
sahitya:
enpAl nI uLLam uruga vENumE tiruccembUr uraiyum semmAn maruganE


anupallavi

  immaiyODu marumayil semmaiyAi em vAzhvu inba sukham uTriDa un padam paTriDum


caraNam    sharaNamenru yAm unadu sannidhi sErum pOdu aravaNaittu anbODu AdarittiDa vENum
dharaNi tanil inimEl orupOdumE emmai tIngEnum aNugAda pAngODu tAngiDavE
